title: Designing Advanced Science Learning through Digital Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level science knowledge and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: A digital collaborative learning course for current elementary school teachers, conducted through periodic sessions in a mobile-based microlearning environment

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peer teachers to perform at least three generative activities (note-taking, compare-contrast, explanation generation) that explain scientific concepts
Learners can analyze and integrate peers' ideas using digital chat tools to derive results of deepened understanding
Learners can select and apply generative preparatory activities optimized according to their prior knowledge levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
